dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 370 IH: Voluntary School Prayer Protection Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Rouzer introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To prohibit the provision of Federal funds to any State or local educational agency that denies or prevents participation in constitutionally protected prayer in schools, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Voluntary School Prayer Protection Act of 2025.

section.header: Funding contingent on respect for constitutionally protected school prayer

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, no funds made available through the Department of Education shall be provided to any State or local educational agency that has a policy of denying, or that effectively prevents participation in, constitutionally protected prayer in public schools by individuals on a voluntary basis.
No person shall be required to participate in prayer or influence the form or content of any constitutionally protected prayer in public schools.
